text: Ezra Matthew Miller (born September 30, 1992) is an American actor of Jewish descent. They played Patrick in the 2012 movie The Perks of Being a Wallflower. For the role they won the Boston Society of Film Critics Award for Best Supporting Actor. Miller appeared in the 2016 movie Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice as The Flash. They played the role again on Suicide Squad, the 2017 movie Justice League and in their own 2023 movie. Miller portrayed Credence Barebone in the 2016 movie Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them.
